item.title: PicoCTF - information

tags: PicoCTF CTF Misc #

Challenge: https://play.picoctf.org/practice/challenge/186?category=4&page=1

Background #

ExifTool

Exploit #

In License row, it’s obviously a base64 encoding string picoCTF{the_m3tadata_1s_modified}
